name: access-log-analyzer-backend
description: Backend API for Access Log Analyzer with PostgreSQL

scripts.db:test: node -e "require('./config/database').query('SELECT NOW()').then(r => console.log('DB Connected:', r.rows[0])).catch(e => console.error('DB Error:', e.message))"
scripts.db:stats: node -e "require('./config/database').query('SELECT COUNT(*) FROM real_log_analyze').then(r => console.log('Total records:', r.rows[0].count)).catch(e => console.error('Error:', e.message))"

author: Your Name
